Very nice quality.
For those of you wondering how these files sustain their quality in such small file sizes, the uploader uses a program called 'Ripbot.' The only sacrifice made is a slight decrease in color saturation, but it's almost unnoticeable for the average viewer.
Keep 'em coming, bricktophd.
